Yet despite all this, they reached the western suburbs, barely 17 km from the Kremlin, but before they ever encircled the city Soviet reinforcements arrived. Some of these new Russian troops were Siberian divisions, equipped and trained for winter fighting. Can you capture Moscow in the face of the strengthening Red Army and the onset of the bitter Russian Winter?

name: Castaway Party
description: Minigame mayhem for mobile! Master over a dozen minigames and compete LIVE against other Castaways. Win a minigame circuit to show off your favorite dance.

name: Block Dude
description: A puzzle based game for the TI84 calculator

name: Truckers Double Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario 127
description:
Super Mario 127 is a fan sequel of Super Mario 63. It is primarily based on the Super Mario Bros. franchise, and incorporates elements from various games in the series.
Like the previous game, it features a level editor.

name: Izanagi Online
description:
From the Civilization Charter, strict rules lay down in the Fifth Continent.
Due to the rapid increase of monsters, people's life fields became overwhelmingly narrowed.
Ones that can use ninjutsu, known as ninjas that were working secretly in the underworld, are now called on for the mainstream jobs such as carrying goods, securing VIPs, and defeating monsters.
With the top leaders of ninjas called the Great Four (G4), the ninjas are now sent off to each land.
To prepare for the upcoming battles with monsters in the far away land not yet known, the ninjas were focusing on with their training.A

name: Irena: Genesis Metal Fury
description: Irena Genesis Metal Fury is a brand new shoot'em up designed for the SEGA Genesis / Mega Drive which is inspired by classic games of the 90’s such as Thunder Force III / IV, Aero Blaster, Super Shinobi II and Contra Hard Corps.

name: Ev.io
description: Ev.io is a multiplayer FPS game set in a futuristic arena. The game features tactical level designs similar to Halo, Destiny, and Quake. You have various weapons and abilities that can be used to your advantage on the battlefield. Click to jump straight into the fight!

name: Copy Editor
description:
Copy Editor is a RegEx tutor within a puzzle game. Regular Expressions are used in computer science and language theory. RegEx patterns direct search operations and manage text. Novices and experienced programmers will enjoy the challenge of creating progressively more complex strings.

In Copy Editor, review famous works and make changes to the text building on new Regular Expressions with each level. Use characters, scripts, and sequences to align your “Input” with the “Objective.” Begin the game with a few expressions and gather skills in combining operations.

A fake Chat Box provides hints along the way. The Chat gives you additional options to select your level, find RegExp tips, and access Help if you are completely baffled. Copy Editor includes RegEx Help, linked to the open source “regular expressions 101” in GitHub.

Whether you are new to using Regular Expressions or want to test your proficiency, Copy Editor promises a fun and challenging puzzle experience.

name: Fashion Boutique
description:
Maya is off to live her dream and make her name in the world of fashion! Since she was a little girl, Maya has always wanted to be involved in the fast-paced fashion business. She’s finally gotten her big break and the chance to open her very own store, but now has some extremely important choices to make! Help balance Maya’s life and career in Fashion Boutique, a fun and exciting Time Management game.

Wacky customers to serve
Tons of different stores to run
Dive into the fashion business!

name: Fab Fashion
description: Fab Fashion is a fashion game about Kate Masters. The big show is coming up, and she has minutes to measure, cut, and sew her artistic designs before the models hit the runway. Work the way up from small town seamstress to a couture superstar through 48 levels in eight unique cities.

name: The Writer Is Anxious
description:
The writer is anxious is a visual novel.
The writer is always anxious. He worries about how to make enough money, about his reputation, about his cat, and finishing a story before the end of the day. The deadline is approaching and he's out of ideas. No story, no pay. What should the writer do? The writer decides to find inspiration, and so begins his
adventure...

name: Kill the King
description: Kill the King is a cooperative, physics-based, VR sandbox. Become a deadly assassin and infiltrate massive castle environments to remove a corrupt king. Use your bow, swords, and anything else you find to reach your goal.

name: Flash Poker - Texas Holdem
description:
Flash Poker is a new take on classical Texas Holdem. With its fast action folding mode and occasional modes enjoy a new type of poker. Join the action with fastest Texas holdem of all time!  
  
Just have 5 mins? Can't wait for a good hand? Play Flash mode and get dealt a new hand immediately when you Flash Fold.  
  
Still in favor of classical poker? Try the classical mode, sit on a table and enjoy as you are used to.

name: Twelve Tales: Conker 64
description:
Twelve Tales: Conker 64 (known in the PAL regions as Twelve Tales Conker) is a cancelled video game that was going to be released for the Nintendo 64. First announced as Conker's Quest at E3 1997, the game would have followed the all ages environment of Conker's Pocket Tales, a handheld title released during its prolonged development cycle.

Before the game could be finished, Rare had already made similar games that had already achieved general acclaim, most notably Banjo-Kazooie and Diddy Kong Racing. The developers began to receive criticism for creating another innocent platformer starring cute and friendly animals. In 1999, Rareware revealed that they were going to entirely redesign the game to appeal to an older audience.

While it was first believed to be an April Fool's joke, the game went unreleased and replaced with Conker's Bad Fur Day in 2001.

name: Hole Punch
description:
Punch holes in walls by dashing through them! Carve up the environment to defeat enemies and navigate the world! - itch.io

Cut holes in the world with a powerful dash, and use physics to take out enemies. A fast paced action romp focussed on physics based destruction. - Steam

name: Demonblood
description: Place towers and survive waves of enemies!

name: Santria
description: SANTRIA! is a light-hearted, modern-setting RPG with a strong emphasis on exploration and character interactions and features a tactical battle system, diverse landscapes, and tons of minigames and sidequests.

name: Being & Becoming
description: Being & Becoming is an atmospheric metroidvania set in a kingdom corrupted by a Collective Dream. The Collective Dream warps the waking world around the dreamer. As a rare lucid dreamer, you will possess those who are captive to the dream and end the nightmare at its source.

name: Astracraft
description: Astracraft is the first sandbox rover craft & combat game on mobile. Navigate your creation into a great space adventure!

name: Sea Raiders
description:
Sea Raiders is a collaborative game uniquely designed for streamer-viewer communities, played exclusively on Twitch.

The Captain: the broadcaster is the captain of their own ship and island, they set the tone for the adventure.
The Crew: viewers can participate and become crew members, with a variety of different roles available.

Crew members develop and customize their own unique pirate avatars, while captains develop their Island. The captain can raid other channels, in order to help streamers across Twitch in different adventures.

name: Total War Battles: Warhammer
description: Total War Battles: Warhammer is a tactical war-simulation mobile game. From micro unit management in battle to macro mediation between players and factions, your empire requires your wits and strategies to stand its ground amidst the scheming Skaven and against the threat from rival factions.

name: Identity
description: Identity is a non-linear, horror/mystery visual novel with a plot based around the premise of self-rediscovery. You take on the role of Yarin Nyrok, a scalie fellow who wakes up with no recollection of himself or anything else. Fortunately, you meet some odd people who are willing to help you, apparently old friends and some new acquaintances.

name: Zecha Tactics
description: Zecha Tactics is a blend of Mecha tactics, story driven RPG, and mercenary outfit management.

name: Moonshell Island
description: Achieve dreams, build a community & save Moonshell Island from Nomsters in this magical action RPG featuring a unique combination of Zelda-like gameplay and story-driven simulation.

name: Harbin
description: Sin descripción

name: Jet Set Radio Future Multiplayer
description:
JSRFMP is a fan made game based on the multiplayer mode of JSRF.

(JSRFMP is NOT a mod for JSRF! JSRFMP is a fan made remake from the ground up. This also means that it is a standalone game, and you do not need to own JSRF to play it.)

name: Factory Magnate
description: A factory tycoon set in a procedurally generated solar system. Build factories and sell your manufactured products. Diversify and redesign factories as demands change. Do you have what it takes to outsmart the competition and earn the title of Factory Magnate?

name: Before the Dawn
description:
In this apocalyptic medieval world, your survival relies on your ability to lead. 
 
With direct control of your followers out of your hands, you will need to build trust in order for them to listen to you. They can refuse orders, retreat in fear, and take what they feel is owed. 
 
Fulfill their needs, overcome challenges and resolve any conflicts that arise within your group and maybe, you might survive another night.

name: Go Cheetah Go
description: A racing game based off of the animated series Wild Kratts. You, controlling a robotic cheetah, must race several A.I. cheetahs across several courses.

name: Simon T Hockey Simulator
description:
STHS, also known as SimonT Hockey Simulator, is a realistic simulation software that gives the ability to the owner to simulate hockey games or multiple complete seasons of hockey with one or more general manager according to the preferences of the owner of the SimonT Hockey Simulator. The program is designed to meet the needs of several general managers and contains an infinite number of options to integrate a sensational realism in the simulation. The software will create a dynamic website (Hosting not included) with all imaginable statistics. The software exists since 2006.

All players of a hockey league are rated according to several attributes (checking, discipline, skating, puck handling, passing, scoring, defense, leadership, etc.) and the goalies are rated according to their different attributes (size, agility, hand speed, reaction time, etc.). After importing the rating in the simulator and distributed players in their team, the general manager can manage their team by taking all decisions of a real general manager and a real coach: who plays in the professional team, who plays in the minors, who is on the top line, who is the # 1 goalie, how many minutes should the top lines played in the game, the lines strategy, etc. In the STHS, a general manager must take the same decisions that a real general manager would take in real life including managing his team finance. The managing of a team is done with a free software call STHS Client.

name: Freja and the False Prophecy
description: Freja and the False Prophecy is a dark 2d action-adventure game set in the world of norse mythology.

name: Dormiveglia
description: Dormiveglia is a 2D metroidvania starring Quinn, the whip-wielding hero of Spring Plaza. Join Quinn as they team up with the other heroes and allies of Elysium, and search for the four sacred Runes hidden about before they fall into the hands of Somnia!

name: Ill
description: Unleash your survival instincts. Step into the sinister town, face a growing horror and uncover the unsettling truth behind the town's descent into madness. Are you ready to confront your deepest fears?

name: Island M
description: Based on the mystery exorcism fantasy “Island” webtoon of the combination of Yang Kyung-il and Yoon In-wan.

name: The Outcast Mobile
description: The Outcast Mobile is an ACG action RPG game. You will follow the original storyline when playing as the main character who specializes in martial arts with thrilling action combo styles and animation effects.

name: Prince of Persia: Redemption
description: Prince of Persia: Redemption was a proposed title in the Prince of Persia series by Ubisoft Montreal in 2010-2011, whose pitch was never picked up. It is rumored to have been a continuation to the Prince of Persia 2008 universe, which ends in a cliffhanger. It reached mainstream news when a YouTube video showing the game's concept surfaced from the depths of the internet in 2020, 8 years after it was uploaded.

name: Blu: Chronicles of Talpa
description: Play as a ninja and explore a fantasy world filled with deadly creatures to save your kingdom from corrupt Guardians. Play in local co-op to give your opponents no rest!

name: Genesis Masterwork Apocalypse
description: "Genesis Masterwork Apocalypse" is a fantasy multi-world RPG mobile game developed by NetEase and based on "famous book" anthropomorphism. Players are the only modern people who can perceive "reality is modified", travel through multiple worlds with different themes and infinite possibilities, collect and develop powerful "fantasy books", and fight against the false world with them .

name: Levi's Garden
description: A cute puzzle platformer where you take on the role of Levi, who is a fox gardener that is looking for more plants to add to his garden. Fight through beetles and jump over spikes to acquire rare plants and complete the game.

name: Traps in Space
description:
Traps in Space is a relaxing puzzle game in which you help a little astronaut save the world! 
Swipe your finger to move the astronaut and help him reach the teleporter, but beware of the traps! 
Suitable for both children and adults!

name: DoubleShake
description: Grab, shake, throw, and kick to save your islands from total chaos in this action-packed blast-to-the-past 2.5D Platformer inspired by some of our favorite 5th generation games!

name: A Fox Tale
description: A Fox Tale is a beautiful pixel art platforming adventure. As our four legged protagonist Eva, you are forced to take an unexpected journey. Explore and enjoy a world of wonder and horror, as you pass through your ever changing surroundings. However, the very nature of foxes means Eva is always cautious and this fox in particular has every reason to be...

name: Aethyr
description:
Aethyr is an action-adventure RPG that features unique character customization, fast paced position-based combat, extensive skill system, and an expansive world filled with secrets, dungeons, and temples to explore.

Set in a world ruined by an arcane apocalypse as humanity faces it’s final days; an unforetold hero seeks to uncover the mysteries of the past, delving into forlorn temples built to honor eldritch gods.

name: Turboroko: Passion Fever
description: Sin descripción

name: Border Reign
description: Border Reign is a cyberpunk SRPG. In the game, players are placed in the predicament of a genetic warfare and in the shoes of a military commander. Fight against the evil P.T.H Corporation as you collect cute fighters voiced by beloved seiyuu such as Ayane Sakura!

name: Ultimate Bomb Squad
description:
Ultimate Bomb Squad is a fast-paced loud stealth platformer where you have to be fast, be stylish, and be careful, because every sound you make has consequences.

Defuse bombs, deceive enemies, avoid hazards, shoot and shout your way to save the day now, tomorrow and yesterday.

name: Click the Clown 2020
description: Short browser game by hubol, with simple clown-clicking gameplay.

name: Terra Pulse
description: Terra Pulse is a metroidvania set in the ruins of a futuristic Rio de Janeiro.

name: Backyard
description: Backyard merges flawless video, voice & text chat with everyone's favorite games, all in one place! Play casual, social deduction, card games and more with 2-12 players.

name: Blazing Snow
description: In this winter fueled 2D action-platformer, wield epic weapons and slide through the snow to rescue Mr Frost's daughter from the claws of the evil witch while being trapped inside a snowman's body.

name: Obsidian Conflict
description:
Obsidian Conflict is a free cooperative multiplayer Source Engine game set in the Half-Life 2 universe. 
It features a large amount of new gameplay features on all-new maps specially designed for Obsidian Conflict with focus on cooperative gameplay, as well as over hundred user-made maps following the same formula. 
 
In addition to that, you're able to play through vanilla Half-Life: Source all the way up to Episode 2.

name: Master of Tactics
description:
Master of Tactics is a 4X Turn Based Strategy Game. It is non commercial and free to play with no in game sales. It is heavy on strategy and light on micro management. 
Features include: 
- Random Galaxy Generation 
- Custom Craft Design 
- Tactical Battle System 
- Diplomacy (Espionage, Sabotage, Trading) 
- Strategic Resources 
- Deep Technology Tree

name: Starona
description: Starona

name: What Comes After
description: 'What Comes After' is an interactive fanfic visual novel about a sad robot simulator with some dog petting gameplay for good measure!

name: Spårvagn
description: Creating a safer commute for the many people.

name: Courage the Cowardly Dog: Hell Bound Hound
description: Oh dear, Courage has stumbled upon the service entrance to Hades and is heading down, down, down! Guide Courage from platform to platform, dodge the ghouls and avoid falling into the fiery pits below.

name: Rockman 8 Metal Heroes Famicom
description: Rockman 8 FC for short, is a fanmade 8-bit version of Mega Man 8 for PC. Like Rockman 7 Famicom before, it is a recreation of the normal game, except sprites and backgrounds are converted to the normal 8-bit format, so it is like the past Mega Man games. Due to this, there are no FMVs.

name: Rise
description: The new game "RISE" developed by NXN has released a promo video today! RISE" is a story-centric MMORPG that is currently in development for multiple platforms including PC and mobile.

name: Steampunk Tower
description:
Tower defense on the rise! 
 
Take charge of the immense Steampunk Tower and help the eccentric Lord Bingham protect his precious Etherium Mine. 
 
As the Imperial Army’s foot soldiers and mechanical monstrosities march into battle, fortify your epic spire with machine guns, cannons, lightning coil, saw launchers and more.

name: SpacePod
description:
SpacePod combines elements of strategy, skill and firepower in an original and unique gaming experience.

The game is based in Earth's orbit, where you assemble a ship from various types of 'Pod' (Engines, Weapons, SolarPanels etc) - and attempt to destroy your opponent's ships.

name: Shattered Soul
description: Shattered Soul is a modern game that interprets beat 'em up by adding the fun with a charming narrative based on metroidvania-style epic action. Explore a fantastic world that intersects medieval Europe, follow stories of adventure in search of lost soul and bodies.

name: Fallen Tear: The Ascension
description: Fallen Tear: The Ascension is an epic adventure set in a vast magical world where you’ll fight dangerous beasts, defy corrupt gods, and face many challenges, all in an attempt to bring balance back to your world.​Embark on this journey with Hira, a mysterious young boy who seeks the truth about his forgotten past. Along the way, bond with many fully-voiced characters to unlock new skills and abilities that will aid you in your battle through environments that constantly change and react to your choices - all in classic, hand-drawn animation.

name: Shin Megami Tensei: Nocturne Randomizer
description:
This is a randomizer for Shin Megami Tensei: Nocturne. 
 
The randomization includes: boss shuffle, enemy/demon shuffle, skill randomization, Magatama and key item drops by bosses, and race randomizer for fusion logic.

name: Black Resin
description: An old-school platformer with modern mechanics in which you sneak through vast, beautiful levels and take control of your foes. Become the avatar of nature and prevent a war-torn, exploited world from collapsing. Uncover the mystery behind a dark substance which the two warring factions crave so much.

name: TideTurn
description: TideTurn is a dynamic third person shooter where diverse characters and water-based weapons clash in a fight over the world's oceans! Submerge into water your weapons create to move seamlessly across any surface. Fight the enemy with movement and abilities limited only by your creativity!

name: Stella Arcana
description:
Want to play an innovative MMORPG? Want a game that mixes thrilling action-RPG combat and relaxing casual game modes? Want a game with a gorgeous art-style and soundtrack? Want exciting team-based dungeons and raids? 
 
Stella Arcana, a tale of bravery and light! Come and join us in the fight to save the Light Realm!

name: Vertex
description: Vertex allows the players to engage in a variety of stances and moves while having the freedom to perform acrobatics and special powers against other players.

name: Iron Assault
description: Iron Assault is a mech action game, designed specifically for GZDoom. It is based loosely on an obscure shooter released by graffiti studios back in the mid nineties. Note that Iron Assault is a re-imagining, not a 1:1 remake of the original. It is heavily influenced by Heavy Gear 1, and Mechwarrior 4 (especially mercenaries).

name: Coral: A Halo Fan Game
description: A free passion project being developed by fans of the Halo series to create a singleplayer/cooperative Campaign experience on PC.

name: Rocketing
description: Rocketing is a 1vs1 Arcade Battle Game. You and your Friends Job is to get the other one Down by throwing Stones at them and their Platform. It can either be played offline Splitscreen or Online

name: Chonka
description: Play as Chonka, a young cat trying to break into a raw cookie dough factory! he's gonna eat all their cookie dough n shieeeet. You have to fight enemies also looking for cookie dough. Many levels and bosses, different routes/endings. just like undertale. Chonka has quasi-ironic humour & controller support!

name: Fallout 76: Brotherhood of Steel
description: Sin descripción

name: Sudoku Slam
description: A free web Sudoku site unlike any other. Use smart hints to teach you new moves, save/share puzzles, undo screw-ups, print to PDF, enter your own puzzle, and download puzzles to play offline. Designed by AJ Shankar and Bill McCloskey.

name: Eternal Perk
description: Eternal Perk is a Low poly game where you can pick up perks and it will give you random effects.

name: Super Donkey
description:
Super Donkey is an unreleased platformer starring an unnamed proto-Rayman-like aviator/explorer who resembles the main character of Nintendo's earlier game Sky Skipper. Two builds were found, though neither one has any sound or music and the onscreen timer is non-functional in both. Judging by the name and some unused sprites, this might have been a Donkey Kong-related project.
Various elements of Super Donkey would eventually be used in Super Mario World 2: Yoshi's Island.

name: Rayman
description: This is a cancelled version of Rayman for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System, for which the game was being previously developed. An early prototype was dumped on the internet in 2017, containing a short and simple level to showcase Rayman's abilities and animations.

name: Shanghai.EXE: Genso Network
description: A Touhou fangame that takes heavy inspiration from the Mega Man Battle Network series, as well as from the Mega Man Zero and Mega Man Star Force series. Development was canceled in 2018 after the original developer received a DMCA from Capcom, but the game has continued to receive unofficial development from fans.

name: Archgate: Pride & Accomplishment
description: Archgate is a single-shard VR MMORPG with hardcore 3rd person combat and deep social gameplay. It’s also a reality show for viewers, and therefore, a platform for content creators. We set out to challenge and improve the current status quo in the gaming industry on multiple fronts. Archgate introduces roleplay-as-a-service, features permadeath regions, and places a strong emphasis on both player individuality and reputation.

name: Creature Chess
description:
Creature Chess is a lofi, browser-based multiplayer auto battler.

Up to 8 players and bots compete, buying cards from a communal deck to choose the best creatures for their board. Each round, players' boards fight each other, in a last-player-standing battle between the competitors

name: Sailor Strike
description: A top-down, low-poly action-packed online naval battle royale game!

name: Global Conflagration
description: Global Conflagration is an RTS game with a modern near futuristic setting.

name: The Simple Balance
description: "The Simple Balance" is a tactical turn-based RPG. Explore a dark fantasy world and defeat enemies with magic spells, mighty weapons, and learned abilities. Manage your team and deploy them promisingly to win the battle. Find out what is going on in this mysterious world and why you are here.

name: Binary Gods
description:
A new sci-fi action project from Rayark, known for their rhythm games they previously released Implosion: Never Lose Hope which has a similar style in some aspects. 
 
Revealed with a concept video the game is likely planned for mobile, possibly the Nintendo Switch, with third-person action and touch controls.

name: High Pressure
description: Sin descripción

name: Guardians of Gemstones
description: Collect all the epic heroes and unleash their power as you fight your way to victory! All Heroes have their own, unique, and special stories!

name: Runelords Arena
description: Runelords Arena is a turn-based strategy game in which your heroes, skills, creativity, and a dash of luck will lead you to victory. Pick from hundreds of heroes hailing from eight unique races; and ascend the throne of Runelords with your unique tactics and strategies!

name: Terraform
description: Terraform is a new, retro style monster taming RPG inspired by games from the Game Boy Color era

name: Heretic Hunt
description:
A little campaign mod by Spiral and Heempy
This is a modification of the standard campaign, only with new encounters and with a new feel!
You are now elites, dropped of by phantoms, killing heretics!

name: Neuro Skazka
description: The game deals with the evolution of a universe grown below the cranial vault of a god which falls asleep. The god’s brain is an equivalent of a solar system, and planets are its neurons. The player will have to turn the celestial bodies into full-fledged anthropomorphic creatures endowed with mind and identity.

name: Pharm Pharaoh
description: Pharm Pharaoh is a 2D pharmaceutical medchem puzzle game.

name: Genesis Quest
description:
Genesis Quest is a classic action-adventure. 
 
 
You're born as a gladiator in a mystical ancient world. 
But all your battles seem senseless as there is no audience to watch them. 
 
Discover the secrets of this lost planet. 
Re-create the world by following the paths of the gods, or your own. 
Save the souls from the chaos. Liberate them or use them to increase your own power. 
But whatever you do, you will have to live with the consequences...

name: Whisper Beyond the Hollow
description: Whisper Beyond The Hollow is a short, incomplete, PSX style atmospheric horror experience made during October 2020 for Halloween Jam 2020, hosted and supported by @HauntedPS1.

name: The Second Circle: A Helltaker fan game
description: You thought taking them from Hell was the hard part. You were sorely mistaken. Welcome to The Second Circle: A HellTaker fan game

name: Sonic Duel
description: Sonic Duel is a Super Smash Bros. Brawl mod, which transforms the well known Nintendo game to a almost completely different title. Removing all (but one) original characters, it replaces them with various characters that have appeared in the Sonic the Hedgehog games. With various maps and soundtracks from the world of the blue speedster, this mod takes Brawl to a completely different league.

name: Sheep Tag 2
description:
Sheep Tag 2 is the first competitive cat and mouse game for PC. It's the standalone successor to the popular Warcraft III mod, Sheep Tag.

Sheep Tag 2 is a team based asymmetric RTS/MOBA hybrid unlike any other game. Sheep Tag 2 is a highly competitive, fast paced, action packed tag game that pits Sheep against Wolves. It's a constant battle for territory as Sheep must survive for a set time, and Wolves must capture all the Sheep within that time. As Sheep you are constantly putting your life at risk to gain the edge over the Wolves, and as Wolves you are thinking of ways to outwit and capture the Sheep. Sheep Tag 2 is so dependent on both teamwork and individual skill level, that each game is a unique chess match, filled with high APM, and cardiac arrest inducing heart rates, that no other game can dream of matching.

name: TitanReach
description:
TitanReach is a modern re-imagining of old-school style MMORPGs. Veteran players will recognise much from the genre they love, while new features bring the game to life for everyone. The game focuses on a deep skilling system, massive fantasy open-world, engaging quests, and a complex, skill-based combat system.

In TitanReach you have the freedom to play the way you want. You can create a tanky sorcerer, a quick and nimble fighter, or even avoid combat entirely.

name: Petal to the Metal
description:
Mushrooms with guns. Do I have your attention? Good. 
 
Petal to the Metal is a bullet hell shoot'em up game. You play as a Flower, killing Mushrooms with your gun that upgrades the more you kill. Progress through the level to reach and destroy the final boss.

name: Gabo
description: Sin descripción

name: Mega Mine
description: Mega Mine is a real time voxel world based multiplayer game. It has different monsters that players must defeat with the help of various items obtained in game and the help of friends! Its build using the engine provided by Minecraft.

name: Reconsider
description: Reconsider is a cute point-and-click puzzle game.

name: Ride n' Chill
description: A low poly car driving game with a radio.

name: Dawnblade
description: Dawnblade is an Action RPG where you can loot dungeons, battle monsters, evolve pets, find treasures, and forge legendary equipment on an epic journey to reclaim the mythical weapon known as the ‘Dawnblade’.

name: Fade
description: Fade is a Narrative Driven Action RPG that combines the combat of the souls series with the narrative direction of Fable. In FADE players will be tasked with exploring the settlements of Celeste, Solemn, Whisper, and The Baltane Capital in order stop the Wildlings Lords and their destructive plot. Take on side quests and side hustles to craft new items and earn new equipment.

name: Mission Ring Possible
description: This FPS turns you into dangerous circle of gondolas to fight the towers of alians invasion down. Optimized for HTC Vive and Oculus Rift.

name: Hills & Hollows
description: Welcome to the town of Null located in the rural Midwest. Inspired by local folklore and campfire horror, you alone have to the tools to solve a mystery plaguing the town as its citizens vanish around you. Can you get to the bottom of this before it's too late?

name: Bionicle: Masks of Power
description: BIONICLE: Masks of Power is a fan-made open-world adventure set in the BIONICLE universe, reliving the legend of the mighty Toa and their perilous quest to collect the kanohi masks of power, free the islanders of Mata Nui, and defeat the evil Makuta!

name: Paramedic Simulator
description:
Emergency, rescue & first aid. 
 
Get ready for a huge variety of challenges and scenarios - varying difficulty levels and unpredictable weather conditions and technical factors will make your job even harder! Numerous minigames (quizzes, hidden objects, reaction tests) add to the gameplay and make Paramedic Simulator a challenge for the whole family.

name: Double Line
description: Sin descripción

name: Amanthi
description: Amanthi is a short adventure game about overcomming your fear of the dark.

name: Fall Ball Fall
description: Sin descripción

name: Sokotale
description:
Every day, you wake up and skillfully maneuver blocks into place. 
 
Every day, you wonder to yourself why you are trapped in perpetuity. 
 
Someday, you will have to take things into your own hands. 
 
Someday, you must destroy the future.

name: HaloMD
description:
HaloMD (mini demo) extends the life of Halo and makes mods fun again.

Neither the retail nor demo version of Halo run on today's Macs.

This project relives the demo experience.

name: Cave
description: Trapped in a dark cave, a young adventurer tries to escape a rather dark fate. On your journey, you will need to dig your way out to freedom. On your path you will collect rare materials, smelt them and craft custom weapons and tools that will help you to escape that hell hole!

name: After-H: Legend of Mars
description: We have lost contact with an outpost on Mars. As part of the Elite Terran commando, you and your team will be sent to Mars to find out what is going on. Will you be up for the task?

name: After-H : Zombies
description: An abandoned space station on an Asteroid swamped by zombies. How long can you survive?

name: After-H: Battle Arena
description: After-H: Battle Arena is a competitive team-based first person shooter game in a post-apocalyptic world setting. Choose your team, weapons and build your squad to participate in epic battles of 4 to 16 players. After-H is an exclusive EVA game offering free roam VR on arenas from 4,300 sqft to 10,700 sqft large!

name: SCP: Cross Containment
description: a fighting game based on the scp universe

name: Pixelmon Town
description: Use your different skill combinations and boundless imagination. Lead your teams to defeat the powerful enemies to get special clearance rewards. Challenges are endless. Don't miss the magical journey, aim at the best pet trainer!

name: Cats Academy
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon Ball Xenoverse and Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 Double Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Pikot: Stream Chat Games
description: Pikot is a game that allows you to interact with your audience on Twitch chat in real time. Through minigames, you can grow your audience and solidify the foundations of a good community by challenging them through logical challenges, memory games and all kinds of games to combine with IRL sessions or simply play with your chat.

name: Esse Rakuraku Kakeibo
description: Sin descripción

name: Your Own Reality
description: First person game based on making decisions. During gameplay you will have to choose between good and evil. Every decision will change your story which may not be as easy as you think. Only you can decide which way to go. On your way you will meet many people who will try to provoke you, but it's up to you whether you keep cool or make the wrong decision under pressure. Some decisions are really hard but there's no escape.

name: Wild Wood
description:
"Wild Wood" is a fast-paced, platform adventure game where players will take on the role of Hare as he journeys in search of his ancestral home, the Ancient Wild Wood Warrens.
You will need all of Hare's superior agility and speed to survive the treacherous trails and outmanoeuvre numerous enemies and hungry predators.

​Do you have what it takes to enter the Wild Wood and live to tell the tale?

name: Ch1mpnotic
description: A free to play, highly competitive Arena Shooter

name: Generals
description:
Discover cunning strategies and become the best general in the world!

Generals invites you to create your own invincible army and test it against other players in fast uncontrollable battles! You can experiment and discover advantageous strategies and become the best general in the game world!

The features of the game are such that to create an invincible army and improve it you need to collect the best units.
The game offers you to fight against armies of other players and thus testing your strategies to see who is the smartest general!
Discover different tactics and strategies!
Of course not without leadership lists. Earn trophies and climb the leaderboard to become the best general in the world!

name: Naval Campaigns Jutland
description: The Fighting in the First World War had been going on for two years. Despite the fact that enormous ground combat had occurred during that time, the powerful naval forces of the world had not clashed in full force. But in May of 1916, that was about to change. The huge dreadnoughts of the English and German fleets departed from their ports to seek each other in the North Sea west of the area of Danish Jutland. In those misty waters, filled with uncertainty, the outcome of the First World War hung in the balance. Will the German fleet crush the English and obtain a German victory at sea or will the stronger English fleet prevail?

name: Naval Campaigns Tsushima
description: At the end of May in 1905, after sailing halfway around the world, the Russian Baltic Fleet arrived in the Straits of Tsushima to do battle with the Japanese Imperial Navy. This battle would decide the outcome of the Russo-Japanese War at sea. The clash of Admiral Togo's fleet with the fleet of Admiral Rozhestvensky's would be one of the most decisive naval battles in history.

name: Naval Campaigns Guadalcanal
description: During the 1942-43 campaign for the southern Solomon Island of Guadalcanal, many naval battles were fought to cement the material advantage gained by the Allies after the stunning Japanese losses at the Battle of Midway. Guadalcanal Naval Battles includes these scenarios such as Savo Island--a costly Allied setback, Cape Esperance--where the Japanese were struck back hard, Tassafaronga, Cape St. George, Kolombangara, and others. The full range of surface naval warfare in the Pacific during World War II is addressed allowing you the chance to see how you might perform as either Japanese or American commander.

name: Naval Campaigns Midway
description:
For six months following its surprise attack on the American fleet at Pearl Harbor, the Imperial Japanese Navy (IJN) had dominated the war in the Pacific. But 4 June 1942 would see the tide turn, with three US Navy (USN) aircraft carriers waiting in ambush for the IJN near a tiny atoll whose name would become immortalized in history: Midway. 
 
By the end of that day, the Japanese would lose four fleet carriers, and the course of the war would drastically change. 
 
Naval Campaigns: Midway covers not only this action but also other major carrier battles of World War Two, including Midway, Pearl Harbor, Coral Sea, Eastern Solomons, Santa Cruz and Philippine Sea. 
 
Can you, as the fleet commander, sail your fleet and fly your air forces to victory, or will you be plunged beneath the deep blue waves never to be heard from again?

name: Naval Campaigns Wolfpack
description:
Historically, Great Britain being an island nation has been one of it's great strengths. However, with the development of the submarine, that strength also exposed a vulnerability. Britain was absolutely dependent on its maritime lifeline, a lifeline the Germans had nearly severed in the Great War, and one they would attack with even more fury in the Second World War. 
 
Wolfpack covers the battles over that lifeline, not only from the perspective of the U-Boats, but also that of the escort commanders on their cold and lonely vigils in the North Atlantic. 
 
Can you bring down the transports that carried the very life blood of Britain? Can you keep the hunters of the sea away, and keep your charges safe?

name: Surf Club
description: Join a young woman named Holly as she returns to her coastal hometown in the hopes of rekindling an old relationship. As she explores the seaside town and reconnects with the locals, she is swept up in nostalgia as the lines begin to blur between the present day and past memories. A narrative-driven adventure game where the player is immersed into Holly’s story through a mix of dialogue and interactive scenes.

name: Running Vs Chat
description:
Running Vs Chat is an endless runner designed for Twitch streamers and their audiences. The streamer has to jump over obstacles and platforms - the twist is that all those obstacles and platforms are placed by the chat. They do this through chat commands, and in addition to that there's also a variety of 'surprises' that chat can trigger by working together on a specific surprise chat command.

The goal of the game for the streamer is to achieve the highest score, while for the chat it's to be the person that stops the streamer's run.

name: Let's Sing 2021: Double Mic Bundle
description: This edition includes the following PS4 Game: Let's Sing 2021, Microphone x 2

name: Free Realms: Sunrise
description: Free Realms Sunrise is a revival of a massive multiplayer online role playing video game known as Free Realms that was created by The Daybreak Game Company. (This game is not affiliated with The Daybreak Company).

name: One of 500
description:
One of 500 is a 3rd-person story-adventure game, which is released episodically. The concept envisages 6 Episodes, each of which is split into 5 Chapters.

Discover the authentic world of Jesus from Nazareth and immersively experience the events, meaning and relevance of the Gospel in its historical-cultural context.

name: Coria and the Sunken City
description:
An epic adventure with much to discover
Follow young adventurer Coria on her travels across the mysterios island of Agoe! Find new skills and weapons to help you on your way, overcome obstacles, beat ferocious enemies and bosses and uncover an ancient secret!

name: Chompsters
description: A pac-man Clone with a lot of levels and extra mechanics like jumping.

name: Springy
description: Sin descripción

name: Medieval Cop: Medieval Angel
description:
It is centered around Amber Heart, a newly minted police officer in Rightia. Join Amber as she investigates the progressively strange occurrences in her daily life.

Medieval Angel is a spin-off series of Medieval Cop, and is also created by GeminiGamer, aka VasantJ.

name: Serpentes
description: A variation on the classic game Snake.

name: Secret Agent Dorito
description: A free little sidescrolling mouselook run and gun game made for the ''unlock xbox'' competition sponsored by doritos, that used to be playable on the now-defunct Yoyogames.com

name: Medieval Cop
description: Meet Dregg, the most depressing cop in the Medieval Times in a country full of idiots and corruption.

name: Four Elements Trainer
description: Four Elements Trainer is a massive Dating Sim/Visual Novel (in development) set in the universes of Avatar: The Last Airbender and The Legend of Korra, and will be 4+ complete games all united into one. Along the way, you'll find plenty of characters, quests, stories, fights, and mysteries to unlock.

name: Third Bridge
description: Third Bridge is a short game about a character stranded on this cursed bridge, based on a real bridge located in Espiríto Santo, Brazil.

name: Just Cause Mobile
description: Just Cause: Mobile was an action-shooter set in the explosive Just Cause universe and designed exclusively for mobile. Action-packed story campaign, 30-person competitive multiplayer, 4-player Co-Op missions - Just Cause: Mobile has all of this and more!

name: Ark II
description: Suddenly awakened on a strange primal world filled with dinosaurs and humans struggling for dominance; you must piece together the history of how you arrived there, team-up with legendary heroes, and confront powerful dark forces seeking to control the fate of all life. Saddle up, and join the definitive next-generation survival experience with ARK 2!

name: Perfect Dark
description: In the near future, Earth will be struck by a series of global disasters, bringing ecosystems around the world to the verge of collapse. Become Joanna Dark, dataDyne’s elite agent as she hunts down the world's most wanted criminal, Daniel Carrington to uncover the mysteries behind the technological breakthroughs that could threaten the lives of millions.

name: Slaugher League
description: Risk it all and become the world’s greatest. Survive an onslaught of twisted obstacles in the world’s most brutal game show, competing in a wide array of lethal online or local multiplayer modes!

name: The Last Cohort
description: The Last Cohort combines RTS elements with small-scale tactics to create uniquely challenging missions. Take control of an elite group of warriors and battle barbarians to rebuild the Kingdom of Vorgunval. With limited resources and troops, how will YOU choose to meet your objectives?

name: 2012 Apocalypse
description: It's a game based on a new film about the end of the world, predicted in the ancient Mayan calendar! Save the humanity from demolition by controlling the forces of four powerful natural phenomena - hurricane, earthquake,fire whirlwind and tornado. Each of the phenomena has its own destructive features! Following the plot of the namesake movie, send the natural disasters through the labyrinths of the city streets, trying to avoid any damage and collect various bonuses. In an additional game mode, you will have a completely opposite task of razing the cities. The more damage you will cause for the stipulated time - the more points you will earn. Let the natural anger out!

name: Unwanted gray
description:
Unwanted Gray is a minimal game with easy controls and a clean look. 
Explore a minimal world populated by black and white particles constantly fighting a war for dominance, where you are an unwanted character who's trying to stay the way he is. 
Your goal is to survive as long as you can while collecting stars and upgrading yourself to become more powerful.

name: Afterworld: The Age of Tomorrow
description: Afterworld: The Age of Tomorrow is the first ever video game produced by a fashion brand. Players are invited to embark on a “hero’s journey” in the near future of 2031, moving through different zones, from a post-apocalyptic Balenciaga store to an enchanted forest, to reach salvation on the other side. Along the way, they meet avatars wearing different looks from the collection, which are rendered in impressive detail.

name: Noolwok Nimble Delivery Service
description: Noolwok Nimble Delivery Service is a first-person fetch and deliver quest game set in a vast post-apocalyptic and unique world in which the sea is the new way of life. Delve into the secrets and adventures of the Noolwok fleet as a parcel deliverer. Use your instinct and trust of the people and environments around you to navigate and solve mysteries on your way to the destination.

name: Scooby-Doo! in the Ghosts of Pirate Beach
description: This is another fun game from Cartoon Network. Help Scooby-Doo and the gang locate the hidden treasure and uncover the mystery of Pirate Beach.

name: Chrono Odyssey
description: Chrono Odyssey is a fantasy MMORPG game. In the upcoming MMORPG, players can pick one of six distinct character classes: Swordsman, Paladin, Ranger, Sorcerer, Berserker, and Assassin. Each comes with unique playstyles and mechanics to facilitate cooperative gameplay and roleplaying.

name: Crimson Company
description: Crimson Company is a competitive card game where players assemble their own armies of mercenaries in a cut-throat fantasy world.

name: Everescape
description: Everescape - is a historical-fantasy simulator, where the player assumes the role of the immigration inspector during a global pandemic.

name: Atsumare! Oekaki no Mori
description: A real-time drawing quiz game in which questions are quickly illustrated and communicated to other players offered on the online gaming site Hange.

name: Wedding Planner
description:
Can charlotte succeed in helping her sister as a wedding planner? Experience the start of finish of all 3 wedding parts: preparations, wedding ceremony and wedding party in
25 different weddings! In both story mode and free mode (accessible when story mode is over) you to can discover what its like to wedding plan in this business simulation,
integrated love story.

name: Zaos
description: International Free to Play Fantasy MMORPG game, featuring incredible journeys through a beautiful expanding world.

name: Gordiho Filmové Dobrodružství
description: The story takes place in a film studio, where a tired and unhappy animator falls asleep exhausted while drawing a picture. At that moment, Gordi and the gloves come to life and together you will look for ways to help the animator complete the film.

name: Acre Shore
description:
"Welcome to Acre Shore! Goodness! It's not often someone comes to stay in our little town.

Make yourself at home! You'll be staying at Theresa's BnB until something more suitable becomes available.

There's just one thing that's been bothering me. I've done some asking around but no one seems to know. Who hired you?"

Acre Shore is an adaptive psychological horror visual novel set in the quiet coastal town of Acre Shore.

You are a detective for hire, summoned by an anonymous employer to solve a mystery that doesn't seem to exist.

name: Rival Peak
description: Survivor-style video game show on Facebook where players watch AI-controlled players 24/7 and help manipulate the game-within-the-game to see who will be voted off next.

name: Brawlers Tavern
description: Hello friend! Why is there not a drink in your hand? Come on in to Brawlers Tavern for some ale, stories, laughter, and most certainly: a brawl! If that's not your cup o' mead, venture outside the tavern and quest with your friends, form a guild, trade with other players, and join in on the frequent solo and team competitions.

name: Morlequariat: The Final Chronicle of the House of Plifk
description: A top-down tactical RPG with turn-based combat and an emphasis on puzzles.

name: Quality Control
description: In this game YOU are the beta tester. Explore the levels. Find the bugs. And fix them !

name: Project Astra
description: Codename: PROJECT ASTRA is the next visual novel in development! We’ll have more details to share in the upcoming future.

name: Solus Sector: Tactics
description: A single-player turn-based strategy with simple mechanics. Control spacecrafts, pick skills, and build bases to reach the center of the galaxy. Each sector presents a new tactical challenge and unfolds the story-line.

name: Ducklin
description: Ducklin is a 2D platformer game. The farmer is chasing you and you have to collect eggs. It is not that easy as it looks.

name: Fight Corp.
description:
Fight Corp. is pretty shady corporation built 100% on violence and fighting. You play as a Mitch Metello, a newcomer looking to rise through the company ranks! 
 
The game is a third-person action adventure game, mixing platforming mechanics with a strong combat system. You have a big moveset at your disposal to crush your opponents with! You can wall-jump, air dash, vertical wall-run and much more! Another mechanic in the game is that your aerial drift dertermines what air-attack you do (back, neutral and forward)

name: DR!FT Hybrid Gaming
description:
Hybrid Gaming - The new way to play!

DR!FT is a realistic racing simulation that can be controlled via your smartphone. Turn your home into a race track! Drive thrilling races on your desk! Get high scores and tune your real racer virtually! In different game modes you can race with or against your friends. Compete worldwide with other players!

Control your DR!FT-Racer with throttle, brake, hand brake, and steering. In addition, the app delivers realistic sound that has been faithfully recorded from real cars.

With its different difficulty levels, DR!FT is suitable for beginners and professionals alike, and with the exact lap time measured by the built-in track scanner, nothing will keep you from having exciting races with your friends.

name: Stream Spinners
description: Stream Spinners is a twitch integrated game/tool that help you interact with your viewers, as you let the viewers battle it out in a spinning top battle royale.

name: Where Is My Parking Spot: Parking Reimagined
description:
Not-So Classic Games, brings you the sequel to Where Is My Parking Spot. Drive, Drift and Slide your way to that special parking spot of yours.

Where Is My Parking Spot: Parking Reimagined takes raging to the next level, Crash once and you fail, Do you have the skill to master all of the parking spots?!

Find your spot in the world. Why can't you just park anywhere? Well that is because this age ol' tradition needs to stay alive. Parking can be a sport if you try hard enough!

name: Zone X
description:
This project was intentionally meant as an in-house family & friends project.
Since we noticed many people and online petitions about a certain "vanished" game,
we try to create an alternative, free for everyone to play.
We can not say this enough, this is not a remake or clone project anymore,
this is a complete new game and will take approx 3 years to complete.
On the way throug time everyone can play for free through development, the game will grow
by each update and more things will be added every update, we will listen to player input.
We have a big edge over game companies, we are gamers ourselves.
We dont have certain time shedules or rush to finish things, we will use all the time that's needed!

name: The Red Room
description: The Red Room. A man named "Alex" is working in a secret government power plant. Everyone has been chipped in the brain. But one malfunction, causes all to go downhill. Being chased by security he runs into the one open door he can. It slams behind, this is the Entry to The Red Room.

name: 1/2 Halfway
description: In a world dominated by black and white, two elements are seeking a path to reunite and restore the harmony.

name: Hangzo
description: Hangzo is a 2D action platformer that was intended for arcades but never got released. It has since become available to play via emulation.

name: Legacy of Kain: Dead Sun
description: Legacy of Kain: Dead Sun was a cancelled action-adventure video game developed by Climax Studios for Square Enix Europe, with an accompanying multiplayer component developed separately by Psyonix. Leaks described Dead Sun as a story-based action-adventure inspired by Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver (1999) (the second installment in the series) and Nintendo's The Legend of Zelda. The game featured an open world, and combined cinematic, violent combat with dungeon crawls, puzzles, and boss encounters. Links to past Legacy of Kain entries figured into the design, such as the shifting mechanic of the Soul Reaver titles, which enabled players to alternate between two planes of existence.

name: Dogman
description: Dogman is a survival horror game based off of the Michigan Dogman urban legend. The player will be deployed to various locations to track down the missing people, while something watches from the shadows, waiting for the opportune moment to strike. Stealth, awareness, and hiding places will be the player's best friend.

name: Cosmic Dawn
description:
Cosmic Dawn is a fast paced retro shooter that stays true to the golden formula of the genres classics while raising the bar with innovative monsters, weapons and a large variety of worlds to traverse. The game features four single player campaigns, of 10+ levels each, secret levels, mini-bosses and an epic campaign-concluding boss fight. The 18 different monsters can be engaged using over 22 weapons and their distinct synergies that lie waiting to be discovered and mastered. Cosmic Dawn also has a competitive horde mode where you can face off against waves of monsters which grow in power and size, the ruleset per match is highly customizable.

Multiplayer deathmatch and coop, as well as a rogue-lite style procedural game mode are planned but will only be possible with publisher support.

name: Dunkehr
description:
The Scale army has occupied the Duchy of Carroten. Many of it's people have been taken hostage, including the Duke's daughter Hop. You are a mercenary who's taken to turning the desperate situation around. They are many, and they are strong. You are but one.

... but you Dunkehr.

name: Scrabdackle
description:
Scrabdackle is a hand-drawn, non-linear zeldalike adventure about going exploring, with a vast, intricate overworld, tight and responsive combat, cheeky banter, and pages of lore to discover – all under a coat of playful charm.

You'll discover secrets, meet the land’s curious inhabitants, master new spells, study magical creatures, and overcome challenging bosses.

name: Vector Prospector
description: Blast through generated worlds! The carefully designed caves of Vector Prospector are completely unique every time you play. The caves are a dangerous test of your wits... and your skills. Can you collect the five green gems and escape alive?

name: Genokids
description: A bizarre music band named Genokids is rocking one of their best concerts to date when The Infinite Empire of Zenodia decides to invade Earth and assimilate mankind, landing right on top of the band and ruining both their concert and mood.

name: Nerus
description: A currently in-development furry kinetic novel.

name: Run for Money Tousouchuu
description: Inspired by the best selling TV program Escaping, the game gives everyone a chance to taste the speed and the thrill of running away from hunters. Spot your captor and run. There are ten stages, and all of them are filled to the brim with danger. Trick the hunters, give them false traces and slip from their clutches until time runs out. If you clear the game, you'll win a fortune.

name: Shin Egokoro Kyoushitsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Dance Mat Typing
description: Educational BBC typing game from the 2000's.

name: Frakktus
description:
Frakktus is an abstract metaphorical representation of the mandala of consciousness, in the center of which is the core of truth, surrounded by mental blocks. Blocks are our fears and doubts, obstacles and complexes. Your role in the game is to control the probe and destroy these blocks, releasing truth from the core. But you need to constantly move, because only in motion the probe beam is able to damage blocks that attacking the player in the rhythm of music. Accumulate mantras and cores of truth, discover new enemies and fight against them for the truth. 
 
If you are tired, you can turn on the Relaxation mode and contemplate the relaxing interactive kaleidoscopic effect on the screen that responds to music from your library. 
 
The unique mandala at each level, the endless gameplay and the color variety of the palettes will help awaken the player’s hidden emotions, remember forgotten truths, escape from routine affairs and possibly discover something new. 
 
Frakktus is a neo-arcade game inspired by the classic retro games of our childhood, created with a unique visual style that combines a mixture of fractal nature, ethnic symbols and cyberpunk lights. 
 
Frakktus is a color shot in consciousness!

name: Project 007
description: Project 007 is a brand new James Bond video game to be developed and published by IO Interactive. Featuring a wholly original Bond story, players will step into the shoes of the world's favorite Secret Agent to earn their 00 status in the very first James Bond origin story.

name: Phantom Gear
description: Gear up in your battle armor and take on the sinister Ocular Force! Become Josephine and put a stop to the power-mad cult and the mysterious phantom force behind their spree of carnage!

name: Mega Marble World
description:
Featuring over 50 rooms of maddening puzzles! 
 
Each room has multiple exits, but be careful, the easy door might not be the one you want! Explore a sprawling dungeon of twisting paths and secret corridors. Avoid bottomless pits and devious traps. 
 
Password system lets you pick up from the last room you completed. 
 
Master the maze and wind your way through as fast as you can, aiming for that high score and best completion time!

name: Machine Cave
description:
Explore an interstellar maze in this physics-based piloting game! Get ready to maneuver and drift as you pilot your spaceship with the forces of momentum, buoyancy, and gravity!

- 16-Directional Flight
- Physics Based Maneuvering
- Interstellar Maze Exploration
- Hand-drawn 8x8 art

Brought to the NES by the talented Aeromangus

name: Yora Adventures
description: Yora Adventures is the smart Tabletop RPG on your mobile device. Use integrated maps, clean adventure text sections, interactive character sheets and connected devices to experience your next game session in a new way - for players and game masters! Why don't you let your mobile phone do all the tiresome work and focus on what pen and paper gaming is about: immersive adventures through rich interactions!

name: Expedition
description:
Where do you go when you’ve already conquered and exhausted your industry? Expedition is the tabletop sensation that spawned three successful Kickstarter campaigns, global distribution through Target and other channels, and a fanbase of thousands around the globe. While their market is divided into the segments of board games, dice games, role-playing games, and card games, Expedition spans all these categories, drawing fans from each. Mega Cat Studios & the Expedition team took that one step further with the world’s first NES cartridge-guided Dungeon Master. 
 
Our collaboration created an exclusive, highly collectible video game cartridge that expanded the play experience and enabled new forms of brand activations and deeper engagement for Expedition fans.

name: Immortal: Gates of Pyre
description: Immortal: Gates of Pyre is an action-packed Battle Strategy game that strips out the chores and focuses on the fun for everyone. Immortal lets the player assume the form of a god-like commander that forges alliances, commands armies, and conquers their enemies from on high.

name: SchafkopfSpiel
description: Schafkopf is a free card game that features the traditional german card game Schafkopf (sheephead), mainly played in bavaria and franconia.

name: Billionaire Banshee
description: Billionaire Banshee is the multiple times viral board game from Breaking Games. This game of social matchmaking became the must-have party night phenomenon of 2018, and has been recognized with a host of awards. Developed by PSC, The Billionaire Banshee video game expanded their reach and immortalized this fan-favorite.

name: Project Gold
description:
Why is it called Project Gold?

This prototype is currently being developed in Unity. The name was inspired by the GoldSrc engine. This name may change as the project is developed into a full game.

What can you do in Project Gold?

In Project Gold you can pickup physics objects and throw them around and even throw explosive barrels for fun. More will be developed.

Future Plans:

Weapons

Enemy and Friendly AI

Vehicles

Epic Gamer Moments

name: Modern Towers
description:
Modern Towers are a imerssive Tower Defense and Strategy game with a fun Twitch integration.

The game are on Early Acces until the end of year 2020

name: Woodbound
description:
Woodbound is an action-adventure game set in a beautiful stylized world currently in development by Smallheart Studios. 
 
 
The player will assume the responsibilities of the leader of a tribe vying for safety and livelihood in the wilderness. Starting alone, the player must hunt, trade or pillage for supplies and materials in order to keep themselves fed, clothed, and healthy. With a focus on object physicality, these tasks are difficult to maintain alone, encouraging interaction with the humans who inhabit the world the players find themselves in. Different NPCs are better at certain tasks than others, and should be assigned to tasks accordingly. NPCs will develop relationships with each other based on interests, co-operative tasks, and other factors, which lead to scenarios of comradery, rivalry, affection and disdain. As time passes and NPCs grow together, families will form, babies will be born and elders will pass away. Life and its elements cycle on throughout gameplay, and affect the way the world is seen and the game is experienced.

name: Heartwood
description:
A modern twist on the classic table-top roleplaying genre. The world is fraught with peril as well as great rewards for those strong enough to seek them. Heartwood awaits. 
 
Heartwood is a fantasy roleplaying game that provides new and exciting content for game masters and their players online. With it, you will embark on a journey to the long lost land of Heartwood, a mysterious and dangerous continent hidden for centuries within the mists of the Ethereal Plane. An unknown magic emanates from the city buried deep below the earth, giving birth to all manner of exotic plants and wildlife, including the enigmatic natives as a new playable origin. 
 
Nestled within the wild and alien jungle are bustling cities with diverse citizens. Outside city walls, feral beasts roam, vines slither with a mind of their own on the jungle floor, and massive bioluminescent flora illuminate the darkness below the canopy. Deep below the earth, Heartwood harbors another secret—a sprawling sunken city teeming with hostile guardians protecting a place with no one left to protect—as well as bizarre reclusive creatures that prey upon the lost and vulnerable, dragging them deep into the subterranean realm where they are never seen again. 
 
The Heartwood platform provides access to a constantly developing game universe for you to explore. All of the content produced will be carefully crafted to give you a fun and streamlined experience. No more digging through hundreds of pages to find the information you need to get started playing, we will guide you every step of the way. As an online game, you will be able to easily look up all game information from any phone, computer, or tablet. All that you need to play the Heartwood tabletop RPG will be in one place, easily accessible, and flexible for how you want to play.

name: Argolis
description:
Every year daring warriors and fighters from all across the land travel to the province of Argolis to partake in a sacred trial of strength and endurance. 
 
Anyone can enter, but only few will emerge victorious. 
 
Argolis combines First-Person movement with fast paced melee combat requiring quick reflexes and well timed reactions.

name: Hime Girl Paradise: Mechikawa! Age Sakari Sensation!
description: Sin descripción

name: Kipper no Eigo Kyoushitsu: Floppy's Phonics Vol. 1 - Kipper-Hen
description: Sin descripción

name: Kipper no Eigo Kyoushitsu: Floppy's Phonics Vol. 3 - Chip-Hen
description: Sin descripción

name: Biohazard: The Mercenaries 3D & Revelations
description: Sin descripción

name: Happy Animal Farm
description: Sin descripción

name: Speedrun
description: Sin descripción

name: Sileo: Tales of a New Dawn
description: Sick of his dead-end job and terrible apartment, a husky packs up his few belongings and heads to the town of Woodcrest, where he moves in with his old college roommate and begins a new life. A currently in-development furry slice-of-life visual novel.

name: Secrets of Magic: The Book of Spells & Secrets of Magic 2: Witches and Wizards - Double Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: IVAO: International Virtual Aviation Organisation
description: IVAO is the world's Flight Simulation Family. a highly-realistic flight simulation and air traffic control simulation network, provided to aviation enthusiasts.

name: Faceball
description:
Faceball is a cancelled port for the Nintendo Virtual Boy.

Even though the game was never released, a late stage prototype was released online. In the prototype 2 modes of play are available, “Normal”, which is the main 1-player game, and “Arena” which most likely would have been the 2-player mode that uses the link cable.

name: Billie Bust Up
description:
Billie Bust Up is a musical 3D platformer inspired by Disney musicals, with memorable unique villains and singing bosses that entwines gameplay with music.

Each main character has their own song that sells their personality, motives, and charm, written by Daniel Ingram from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic.

name: First Adventure
description: You are a hunter who loves to explore dungeons in search of treasures with the help of your partner, but she disappeared! She left suddenly, it looks like she was mad at you, but you don't know why.

name: Age of Cards: Ra's Chess
description: Ra's Chess is a strategic turn based chess-card game for online multiplayer between two players. Despite being easy to learn it is complex and includes deep strategy.

name: Hometown War
description:
Hometown War is a unique World War II first person shooter.
HOMETOWN WAR History
The Battle for Sihang Warehouse took place from October 26 to November 1, 1937.
The Battle for Sihang Warehouse held out against numerous waves of Imperial Japanese Army and covered National Revolutionary Army retreating west during the Battle of Shanghai.

name: Calorie Defenders
description: Play as veggies inside the human body helping defend the Hunger against adorable candy. It's a mix of 2D action platforming and tower defense style combat with a slight bit of Metroidvania like exploration.

name: Brave Eduardo
description: Play as a Teddy Bear trying to find his owner in a 2D Open World.
